scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for serverless functions'
scripts.test-db: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mysql = require('mysql2/promise'); mysql.createConnection(process.env.DATABASE_URL).then(connection => connection.execute('SELECT 1')).then(() => { console.log('✅ Database connection successful'); process.exit(0); }).catch((error) => { console.error('❌ Database connection failed:', error.message); process.exit(1); });"
